Interface ConnectionFactory.Connection.EventListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing interface:
    ConnectionFactory.Connection

    public static interface ConnectionFactory.Connection.EventListener
extends java.util.EventListener

    A listener for events that may occur with the connection.

    Author:
    Carter Waxman
